description: This command is used for confirmation of aftermarket FOA pre-confirmations. E.g. AfterNIC requires them for com/net/org/biz/info. Sedo requires them for all gTLDs.
availability: If the command gets used on a white-label page without user pre-authentication, then only DOMAIN[0..N]= and TRIGGER= parameters should get used for security reasons.

paramaters.Definition: The trigger from the confirmation link
